programme.title: James Munroe's declaration of independence
programme.short_synopsis: President James Munroe's battle to keep America out of the hands of European invaders.
programme.medium_synopsis: The journalism of James "Scottie" Reston, and President Munroe's declaration that America should not be considered as a future target for colonisation by European nations.

programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
